chargeFee(bytes32,uint256).details: Charges a specified fee from the campaign reserve.

fundCampaign(bytes32).details: Allows users to fund an existing campaign.

params._campaignId: The ID of the campaign to fund.

getCampaign(bytes32).details: Gets the details of a specific campaign by ID.

getCampaignsByOwner(address).details: Gets all campaign IDs owned by a specific address.

params._owner: The address of the campaign owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerCampaign(string).details: Registers a new campaign for the sender.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address).details: This function reverts if there are no funds to withdraw or if the transfer fails. It should only be callable by the owner of the contract.

params._beneficiary: The address to which the Ether should be transferred.

withdrawToken(address,address).details: This function reverts with a 'NothingToWithdraw' error if there are no tokens to withdraw.

params._beneficiary: The address to which the tokens will be sent.
params._token: The contract address of the ERC20 token to be withdrawn.

withdraw(address).notice: Allows the contract owner to withdraw the entire balance of Ether from the contract.

withdrawToken(address,address).notice: Allows the owner of the contract to withdraw all tokens of a specific ERC20 token.
